casebody.data:
Jonathan Eugene Brunson
v.
N.C. Dept. of Public Safety's Superintendent Felix Taylor of Pasquotank Correctional Institution and State of North Carolina, et al. No. 247P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 15, 2017 Jonathan Eugene Brunson, for Brunson, Jonathan Eugene. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 6th of February 2017 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Cumberland County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of February 2017."
